name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Researchers say they may have figured out how the ancient Egyptians built the Great Pyramid of Giza. What they haven’t figured out is how the ancient Egyptians got Mexico to pay for it.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The other day in Australia, a wedding took place inside a Costco. Because it was Costco, the groom came home with 12 brides.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: San Diego has started building a border wall. Not to keep out immigrants, but to keep the LA Chargers from coming back.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In Britain, a group of hikers had to be rescued from the country’s highest peak because they were too stoned to walk. The hikers were thousands of feet high, and then they started climbing the mountain.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In China, for the first time ever, a robot performed dental surgery without human assistance. Everyone was excited until they remembered that the robot was just supposed to vacuum the living room.
